      • saveWorkflow

        public void saveWorkflow(java.util.UUID jobId,
                         org.json.JSONObject etlPacket)
        Writes workflow to a file

        Opens the workflow directory and creates a json containing UUID of the workflow by writing ETLPacket information into it.

        Parameters:
        jobId - UUID of Job
        etlPacket - JSONObject

      • readWorkflow

        public org.json.JSONObject readWorkflow(java.util.UUID jobId)
        Read workflow from a file

        Opens the workflow by reading it through a StringBuffer and returning it as a JSONObject

        Parameters:
        jobId - The UUID of the workflow
        Returns:
        JSONObject containing information of workflow

      • readSavedWorkflows

        public void readSavedWorkflows()
        Reloads saved workflows

        In the case of when DataMETL is restarted, it will reload all the saved workflows from disk and determines the jobState.

      • poll

        public void poll()
        Determines whether or not a workflow should start

        Reads the workflows saved on disk and reads the time to determine if it should start
